CustomField.description: Temporary field to fix short-term reporting issue.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Unit_Type__c, "Minute"), "Minutes", IF( ISPICKVAL(Unit_Type__c, "Month"), "Licenses", IF( ISPICKVAL(Unit_Type__c, "Event"), "Minutes", IF( ISBLANK(TEXT(Unit_Type__c)), "Minutes", TEXT(Unit_Type__c) ))))
CustomField.label: Unit Type Rollup
